title: Enhanced electrochemical dissolution of Iridium oxide in acidic electrolytes through presence of metal ions: shortened lifetime and hope for recovery
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00257A, Paper

Raghunandan Sharma, Per Morgen, Darko Makovec, Sašo Gyergyek, Shuang Ma Andersen
Nanoparticulate Ir-oxides are frequently used as highly active and robust anode electrocatalysts for acidic water electrolyzers. While their dissolution during the electrolyzer operation is unsought, it could be a green...
